title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 166.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 166.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish standards and
procedures for the awarding of grants pursuant to article 103 of the Education
law to approved labor organizations, federations of labor organizations, or
organizations of employers acting in consortium with labor organizations for
the conduct of workplace literacy and basic skills education
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
166.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
